articles.content: Those following the MacBook Pro 2021 rumors know that Apple's next high-end laptop looks to be getting some of the ports it lost back in 2016, when Apple threw everything out for Thunderbolt 3 USB-C.… [+1478 chars]

articles.title: Add 'Overwatch 2' and 'Diablo 4' to your list of delayed 2021 games - Happy Mag
articles.description: Official announcement revealing two of the most highly-anticipated games of the year, 'Overwatch 2' and 'Diablo 4', will be delayed.
articles.content: It seems that almost every game expected to release this year is being delayed. Well, add Overwatch 2 and Diablo 4to the stockpiling list. At this point, if you earned a dollar every time there was a… [+1590 chars]

articles.title: Previous: Razer Huntsman V2, the newest keyboard on the market, goes analogue - Happy
articles.description: Razer's Huntsman V2 is its latest gadget and goes back to the basics by being a keyboard that capitalises on its analogue features.
articles.content:
Get excited for the Razer Huntsman V2, which just hit shelves on February 5th. At first glance it certainly doesn’t disappoint, with familiar and colourful RGB lighting alongside impressive specs.
